messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/22/2003 9:15:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Me! I m sure we can work something out. I can t do anything about the drive, though! ~Kelly
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/22/2003 9:15:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
mymorningdoveb@... writes:
> I hope we get to come to the SC conference. I'm trying to get the money to
> go, but we are on a limited income. Maybe a work scholorship would help, if I
> knew who to talk to about this. Do you know who I could contact about it?

Me! I'm sure we can work something out. I can't do anything about the drive,
though!
~Kelly
